pattern.name: Integral
pattern.description: The integral (area under curve) is computed with trapezoidal rule as described at: http://www.lexjansen.com/wuss/2004/posters/c_post_the_sas_calculations_.pdf
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: WITH intermediate AS ( SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , @numericalColumn nowValue , @timeColumn nowTime , LAG(@numericalColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @baseId, @baseDate ORDER BY @timeColumn) AS lagValue , LAG(@timeColumn) OVER (PARTITION BY @baseId, @baseDate ORDER BY @timeColumn) AS lagTime FROM @propagatedTable ) SELECT @baseId , @baseDate , @baseTarget , sum((nowValue + lagValue) * (nowTime - lagTime) / 2) "@columnName" FROM intermediate GROUP BY @baseId, @baseDate, @baseTarget
